content:
I apologize for the confusion, but as an AI language model, I don't have access to perform reservations on your behalf. I am here to assist you in generating responses to your questions and provide information to the best of my abilities. However, I can provide you with the contact information of the restaurant in question, and you can call them directly and make a reservation.

The recommended Asturian cuisine restaurant in Gijón is Restaurante La Pondala, and you can contact them at (+34) 985 34 13 64.
